pages.text: Using on a $(item)Banner$() with a $(item)Map$() selected places a marker of the banner's position on the selected $(item)Map$(), and using on the $(item)Banner$() again removes the marker. $(br2)The marker has the same color as the banner. $(br2)The marker is removed if the banner is destroyed unless the map is locked using a $(item)Cartography Table$().
$(br)If the banner is renamed, the name appears below the marker.
